items.q: How accurate are the AI answers?
items.a: AI drafts the answer and filters what is relevant for your business, then you can auto-approve or review in the admin panel. You can edit tone, add links, or request another pass before publishing.
items.aFull:
AI drafts the answer and filters what is relevant for your business, then you can auto-approve or review in the admin panel. You can edit tone, add links, or request another pass before publishing so the wording matches your brand.

We keep a revision trail in the admin panel so teams can compare versions and keep approvals lightweight. You decide what goes live and when, and the FAQ keeps improving as new questions arrive.

items.q: Do we control the approval workflow?
items.a: Yes. AI filters what matters to your business, and you choose auto-approve or a review queue in the admin panel. Set rules per category or page to keep quality consistent.
items.aFull:
Yes. AI filters what matters to your business, and you choose auto-approve or a review queue in the admin panel. Set rules per category or page so the right team sees the right drafts.

You can add reviewers, require approvals, or allow auto-publish for low-risk topics. The admin panel keeps a clear status trail so nothing ships without your control.

items.a: Most teams connect and publish in a short working session, often the same day. Import your pages or CMS, review drafts, and go live with a widget or /faq page.
items.aFull:
Most teams connect and publish in a short working session, often the same day. Import your pages or CMS, review drafts, and go live with a widget or /faq page.

If you want to start smaller, publish only a few high-impact questions first and expand over time. The system keeps your structure and SEO markup consistent as you add more content.

items.a: Structured FAQs help pages rank for long-tail questions and improve snippet eligibility across search engines. Clear, consistent answers also strengthen on-page relevance and internal linking.
items.aFull:
Structured FAQs help pages rank for long-tail questions and improve snippet eligibility across search engines. Clear, consistent answers also strengthen on-page relevance and internal linking.

As new questions appear, you can refresh content so search engines see updated, helpful answers. Clean structure and schema-ready formatting make it easier for crawlers to understand intent.

items.a: WordPress, Shopify, Webflow, WooCommerce, and custom sites via script or widget. If you have a custom stack, you can embed the FAQ anywhere and still manage it centrally.
items.aFull:
WordPress, Shopify, Webflow, WooCommerce, and custom sites via script or widget. If you have a custom stack, you can embed the FAQ anywhere and still manage it centrally.

You can start with a simple embed and later move to a dedicated /faq page without losing data. API access is planned, so integrations will keep expanding.

items.q: Is there a social or influencer use case?
items.a: Yes. Create a public FAQ page and share it in your bio so followers get consistent answers. Automation for IG/YouTube/TikTok is on the roadmap.
items.aFull:
Yes. Create a public FAQ page and share it in your bio so followers get consistent answers. Automation for IG/YouTube/TikTok is on the roadmap.

It helps reduce repeated DMs, keeps links and policies consistent, and gives collaborators a single source of truth. You can update the FAQ once and reflect changes everywhere.
